fs_files.content:
FROM: Harbor-12 Relay Ops
SUBJ: Emergency Reroute Packet

The relay mesh collapsed in under six hours.
Archive traffic was sealed behind Vault-01.
We left a thin lane on the last stable ring.

NAV:
LINK: HARBOR_12 -> ARCHIVE_01

DE: Operaciones Relay Harbor-12
ASUNTO: Paquete de reencaminamiento de emergencia

La malla de relays colapso en menos de seis horas.
El trafico del Archivo quedo sellado tras Vault-01.
Dejamos un corredor fino en el ultimo anillo estable.

NAV:
LINK: HARBOR_12 -> ARCHIVE_01
